SEARCH
Package com.lovelettergame

Class Player

java.lang.Object
com.lovelettergame.Player
public class Player extends Object
The Player class represents a player in the Love Letter game.

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructors
    Constructor
    Description
    Player(String name, int playerID)
    Creates a new player with the given name, initializing their score, protection status, and game status.

      public Player(String name, int playerID)
      Creates a new player with the given name, initializing their score, protection status, and game status.

  • Method Details

    • isOut

      public boolean isOut()
      Checks if the player is out of the current round.
      Returns:
      true if the player is out, false otherwise.

    • setOut

      public void setOut(boolean out)
      Sets the player's out status.
      Parameters:
      out - true to mark the player as out, false to keep them in the round.

    • getPlayerID

      public int getPlayerID()

    • getScore

      public int getScore()
      Gets the player's current score.
      Returns:
      The player's score.

      public void setScore(int score)
      Sets the player's score.
      Parameters:
      score - The player's new score.

    • getName

      public String getName()
      Gets the name of the player.
      Returns:
      The name of the player.

    • getHand

      public Card getHand()
      Gets the player's current hand (card).
      Returns:
      The player's current hand (card).

    • setHand

      public void setHand(Card card)
      Sets the player's hand (card).
      Parameters:
      card - The new hand (card) for the player.

    • isProtectedC

      public boolean isProtectedC()
      Checks if the player is protected from card effects.
      Returns:
      true if the player is protected, false otherwise.

    • setProtectedC

      public void setProtectedC(boolean protectedC)
      Sets the player's protection status.
      Parameters:
      protectedC - true to protect the player, false to remove protection.

    • playCard

      public Card playCard(Card card, Scanner scanner, List<Player> players)
      Plays a card and applies its effect to the player and the game.
      Parameters:
      card - The card to play.
      scanner - A Scanner object for user input.
      players - A list of all players in the game.
      Returns:
      The played card.

    • hasCard

      public boolean hasCard(int hierarchy)
      Checks if the player holds a card with the specified hierarchy value.
      Parameters:
      hierarchy - The hierarchy value to check.
      Returns:
      true if the player holds a card with the given hierarchy, false otherwise.

    • addToScore

      public void addToScore(int roundScore)
      Adds points to the player's score.
      Parameters:
      roundScore - The points to add to the player's score.
